head.title: function-parentheses-space-inside
head.description: function-parentheses-space-inside Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions. Options…

body:
#function-parentheses-space-inside

Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions.

a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
/**                     ↑      ↑
 * The space inside these two parentheses */

#Options

string: "always"|"never"|"always-single-line"|"never-single-line"

#"always"

There must always be a single space inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { transform: translate(1, 1); }
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }

#"never"

There must never be whitespace on the inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { transform: translate(1, 1); }

#"always-single-line"

There must always be a single space inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
a { transform: translate(1,
  1) }
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}

#"never-single-line"

There must never be whitespace inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
a { transform: translate( 1,
  1) }
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}
rawBody:
# function-parentheses-space-inside

Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions.

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
/**                     ↑      ↑
 * The space inside these two parentheses */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"never"|"always-single-line"|"never-single-line"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a single space inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1); }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
```

### `"never"`

There *must never* be whitespace on the inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1); }
```

### `"always-single-line"`

There *must always* be a single space inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1,
  1) }
```

```css
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}
```

### `"never-single-line"`

There *must never* be whitespace inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate( 1,
  1) }
```

```css
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}
```
raw:
---
title: function-parentheses-space-inside
---

# function-parentheses-space-inside

Require a single space or disallow whitespace on the inside of the parentheses of functions.

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
/**                     ↑      ↑
 * The space inside these two parentheses */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"never"|"always-single-line"|"never-single-line"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a single space inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1); }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
```

### `"never"`

There *must never* be whitespace on the inside the parentheses.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ); }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ); }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1); }
```

### `"always-single-line"`

There *must always* be a single space inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1,
  1) }
```

```css
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}
```

### `"never-single-line"`

There *must never* be whitespace inside the parentheses of single-line functions.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate( 1, 1 ) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1 ) }
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
a { transform: translate(1, 1) }
```

```css
a { transform: translate( 1,
  1) }
```

```css
a {
  transform: translate(
    1,
    1
  )
}
```
